description: Returns the attachment that has the specified ID. Attachments can include screenshots, error logs, or other files that describe your issue. Attachment IDs are generated by the case management system when you add an attachment to a case or case communication. Attachment IDs are returned in the  AttachmentDetails objects that are returned by the  DescribeCommunications operation.

parameters.name: attachmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the attachment to return. Attachment IDs are returned by the  DescribeCommunications operation.

nested_items.name: attachment
nested_items.description: This object includes the attachment content and file name.

nested_items.name: fileName
nested_items.description: The name of the attachment file.

nested_items.name: data
nested_items.description: The content of the attachment file.
